snippet: Stephen M. Case, the investor who co-founded AOL, is betting that the “farm-to-table” salad chain has the potential to become an iconic brand in the healthy dining category.
abstract: Stephen M. Case, the investor who co-founded AOL, is betting that the “farm-to-table” salad chain has the potential to become an iconic brand in the healthy dining category.
lead_paragraph: Venture capitalists are increasingly taking an interest in the food business, with several start-ups trying to bring fresh thinking to what consumers put on their plates.

headline.main: Revolution Fund Invests in Sweetgreen Salad Chain
